message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a valuable item worth $150 to both of us. To start, I propose a price of $140 for it. I believe this is a fair deal considering its worth and the opportunity it presents.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that price for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and I'm willing to make a deal at that point.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. However, based on the cost and value we've invested in the product, I cannot agree to the $130 price point. My counteroffer would be $135 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests and respects the true value of the item.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $132. I think this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm excited about the possibility of making a deal.
